action.program_description: An email client displaying a new email.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client with a new email open. The email is from Fujitsu regarding rescheduling a meeting. The user is requesting to move the meeting one hour later, from 2024-11-17 16:00~17:00 to 17:00~18:00. The email client is syncing.
action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is not visible in the screenshot, so no mouse action can be determined.
